org.epochx.op
Class ConfigOperator<T extends Model>

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.op.ConfigOperator<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigListener, Listener, Operator
Direct Known Subclasses:
DepthFirstMapper, FitnessProportionateSelector, FixedLengthInitialiser, FixedPointCrossover, FullInitialiser, FullInitialiser, FullInitialiser, GrowInitialiser, GrowInitialiser, GrowInitialiser, LinearRankSelector, OnePointCrossover, OnePointCrossover, PointMutation, PointMutation, RampedHalfAndHalfInitialiser, RampedHalfAndHalfInitialiser, RampedHalfAndHalfInitialiser, RandomSelector, SinglePointMutation, StandardGenerator, SubtreeCrossover, SubtreeMutation, TournamentSelector, WhighamCrossover, WhighamMutation
public abstract class ConfigOperator<T extends Model>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Operator, ConfigListener

Abstract class that should be extended to support auto-configuring operators.

          Constructs a ConfigOperator with a model.

Constructor Detail

ConfigOperator

public ConfigOperator(T model)
Constructs a ConfigOperator with a model.

Parameters:
model - the Model from which configuration parameters should be loaded. If the model is non-null then this operator will be enrolled to receive configure events.
Method Detail

onConfigure

public void onConfigure()
Configures the operator with parameters from the model. This method will be called at the appropriate times to configure this component. Implementing classes should override this method to setup the operator with any parameters required from the model. If no model is set then this instance will not be subscribed to configure events and so alternative means must be used to configure it.

Specified by:
onConfigure in interface ConfigListener

getModel

public T getModel()
Returns the model that is providing the configuration for this initialiser, or null if none is set.

Returns:
the model that is supplying the configuration parameters or null if the parameters are individually set.

setModel

public void setModel(T model)
Sets a model that will provide the configuration for this operator. The necessary parameters will be obtained from the model the next time, and each time a configure event is triggered. Note that until a configure event is fired this operator may be in an unusable state. Any previously set parameters will stay active until they are overwritten at the next configure event.

If a model is already set, it may be cleared by calling this method with null.

Parameters:
model - the model to set or null to clear any current model.
